column1: Natalies's family will receive family and friends on Monday from 9:45 to 11:45 a.m. at the Washington Memorial Funeral Home
column3: North Haven. Her funeral procession will leave from the funeral home at 12:00 p.m. for a Mass of Christian Burial which will be celebrated at 12:30 p.m. at Our Lady of Pompeii Church
column5: East Haven. Burial will follow in St. Lawrence Cemetery
